value.title: Voice technology for the rest of the world
value.excerpt: The growth of voice-enabled technology is not universal. For much of the world, technology remains frustratingly silent. The challenge is data. Voice assistants need thousands to millions of unique examples to recognize individual keywords like “light” or “off”.
